data.lyric:
[ti:Wake Me Up (Zack Edward Remix)]
[ar:Avicii]
[al:Wake Me Up (Zack Edwards Remix)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Wake Me Up (Zack Edward Remix) - Avicii (艾维奇)
[00:30.44]Written by：Avicii/Aloe Blacc
[01:00.89]Feeling my way through the darkness
[01:03.15]
[01:04.62]Guided by a beating heart
[01:06.67]
[01:08.15]I can't tell where the journey will end
[01:10.98]
[01:12.20]But I know where to start
[01:14.00]
[01:15.69]They tell me I'm too young to understand
[01:18.42]
[01:19.46]They say I'm caught up in a dream
[01:21.70]
[01:23.18]Well life will pass me by if I don't open up my eyes
[01:26.71]
[01:27.29]Well that's fine by me
[01:28.87]
[01:29.47]So wake me up when it's all over
[01:32.53]
[01:33.57]When I'm wiser and I'm older
[01:36.45]
[01:37.37]All this time I was finding myself
[01:40.65]And I didn't know I was lost
[01:43.81]
[01:44.60]So wake me up when it's all over
[01:47.50]

[01:51.39]
